-- | Shake rules for building Kansas Lava projects

@package kansas-lava-shake

module Development.KansasLava.Shake.Xilinx
data XilinxConfig
XilinxConfig :: FilePath -> String -> XilinxConfig
xilinxRoot :: XilinxConfig -> FilePath
xilinxPlatform :: XilinxConfig -> String
xilinxRules :: XilinxConfig -> String -> [String] -> Rules ()

lavaRules :: FilePath -> String -> String -> Rules ()
